column1: Sadly this week @ChuckSchumer and National Democrats rejected critical relief efforts to assist Alaskans as we face COVID-19. This is the same group of National Democrats that @DrAlGrossAK openly supports and wants to empower.  https://t.co/Egg250g9yp

I recently sat down with KTVF Fairbanks to discuss Alaska’s economy police reform and COVID-19.   As I said in the interview tough times don’t last – tough people do. And there’s no one tougher than Alaskans. We will get through this stronger and more resilient than ever. https://t.co/Up6QlhIlmL

The COVID-19 pandemic has underscored the need to change the U.S.-China relationship. There is broad bipartisan support to hold the communist Chinese government accountable and bring manufacturing supply chains and the development of critical minerals back to our country. https://t.co/YoCYAdJWNA

As a reminder here are best practices and health tips to #StopTheSpread of COVID-19.  There’s no doubt these are difficult times but Alaskans have proven time and time again we will overcome our challenges. https://t.co/BFZtSTt1yB
Senator Sullivan recently sat down with KTUU to discuss a number of important issues including preparedness in response to the spread of COVID-19.  https://t.co/0T2J0vVPsf
